subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
Tests and Testing
Steroids
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay reliever Juan Salas was suspended for 50 games after becoming the first major leaguer this year to flunk a drug test.
snippet: Tampa Bay reliever Juan Salas was suspended for 50 games after becoming the first major leaguer this year to flunk a drug test.
